## Summary

This shiny app is used to illustrate the job status of alumni from VNUK. The apps is deployed on shiny serve where the link is https://thuyle.shinyapps.io/Assignment_Shiny_Application/. The code can be found at https://github.com/thuyle304/Peer-graded-Assignment-Course-Peer-graded-Assignment-Shiny-Application-and-Reproducible-Pitch/tree/master

##  First step

You choose the major from the drop down box. There are two options: IBM (international business management) and CSE ( computer science engineering)

## The second step

The results are shown in table and graph

## The table 

The table has two column. The first one shows the job status. The second one has the number of alumni in that status accordingly. 

## The graph

The graph illustrates the information in the table with x axis which is job status and y axis which is the number of alumni
